text: David Burhani (17 November 1990 - 30 January 2017) was a Tanzanian footballer. He played as a goalkeeper for Prisons, Mbeya City, Maji Maji and Kagera Sugar of the Tanzanian Premier League. Burhani died on 30 January 2017 in Mwanza at the age of 26. ==References== ==Other websites== * David Burhani at Footballdatabase Category:1990 births Category:2017 deaths Category:African footballers Category:Tanzanian sportspeople Category:Football in Tanzania
title: David Burhani
